subject: End-to-end testing and verification
description:
Run manual triggers for all 5 phases with --dry-run flags. Verify outputs at each stage: dependency-graph.json (valid DAG), research-queue.jsonl (50-200 findings), findings.jsonl (15-30 with multi-targets), ecosystem-plan.json (8-12 innovations), GitHub issues (8-15 across projects), draft PRs (3-5), package updates, documentation updates, meta-vengine evolution changelog, ecosystem brief.

Success criteria:
- All phases execute without errors
- Outputs verified (dependency graph, findings, innovations, PRs, brief)
- Metrics meet targets (50-200 papers/day, DQ >0.7, relevance >0.8, cost <$5/day)
- Ecosystem brief delivered by 8:05am
- Cross-project synergies detected (3-5)
- Meta-vengine evolution triggered

Dependencies: All phases 0-5 completed
